author: larryi
msg: Cleaned up some syntax.  Started changing some " to " and
Started changing "Tomcat" to "Tomcat 3.3" in some places.  There are
enough differences from older Tomcat's that the version covered by this

author: larryi
msg: Updated to set the colonPort property to "" if port 80 is used.  Avoids
false failures when default handling would expect  "http://localhost:80/..."

author: larryi
msg: Added a "colonPort" property that includes the colon with the port number,
and updated response matches to use it to in place of ":${port}".  This allows
you to avoid false failures when using the default port 80.
